title: Need help to find the Bearded Brothers energy bars font
content:
Hello my friends, i m doing a logo and i m want to put in it the font type that says "A wholsome snackfood company", that handwrite style looks awesome, does somebody know the name of this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235840im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_5765.png)
author: HankScorpio

comments.content: Looking at the variations in the letters "E" and "R", my guess is this was hand lettered.

potentially helpful substitutes for the main type, if anyone is interested:

[Firenza](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeart/firenza-text/bold/)  
 [Skurier](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nowak/skurier/bold/)  
 [Stinky School Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nerfect/stinky-school-book/)

for the small type (original request)

[Joe Mad](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235840/http:/www.fonts.com/font/comicraft/cc-joe-mad/joe-mad-intl-complete-family-pack) is a kindof nice plain handwritey font.
